dcterms:creator: Ryo Yonetani
Kris M. Kitani
Yoichi Sato
dcterms:description: The UTokyo Paired Ego-Video (PEV) Dataset contains 1226 paired egocentric videos recording dyadic human-human interactions, consisting of 8 interaction categories recorded by 6 subjects.
dcterms:title: UTokyo Paired Ego-Video (PEV) Dataset

dcterms:creator: Sanath Narayan
Mohan S Kankanhalli
Kalpathi R Ramakrishnan
dcterms:description: The NUS First-person Interaction Dataset contains 152 first-person videos and 133 third-person videos of both human-human and human-object interactions.
dcterms:title: NUS First-person Interaction Dataset

dcterms:creator: Michael S Ryoo
Larry Matthies
dcterms:description: The JPL First-Person Interaction Dataset consists of 84 videos of humans interacting with a humanoid model with a camera mounted on its head, featuring 7 different interactions.
dcterms:title: JPL First-Person Interaction Dataset
